Class RequestStatusController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301fa16t5.legendary_telegram.RequestStatusController

  • public class RequestStatusController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the Request Status screen. Most important job is to cancel requests when needed.
